item.title: Coding Challenge 000 - Hello World!
item.description: Objectives Summary Set up the development environment Create a stand-alone executable Print “Hello Wolrd!” into a console when run Introduction Hello there! Welcome to my own list of coding challenges born from frustrations with the google results to ‘coding challenge’ being either not related or subscription services. Already planning on learning a few new languages, I figured the best way to do so is set a nice gauntlet of challenges to myself.
